function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Organizations lacking the ability to sense and respond to new opportunities","Impact":"Missed opportunities and inability to adapt to changing market conditions","Mitigation":"Invest in market research and trend analysis, and develop agile processes for opportunity identification","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI-powered market intelligence tools","People":"Organizational leaders, strategic planners","Owner":"Organizational leadership"},{"Description":"Failure to rapidly implement resource allocation and competency adjustments in response to opportunities","Impact":"Competitive disadvantage and inability to capitalize on market opportunities","Mitigation":"Develop agile processes for rapid resource reallocation and competency development","Technologies":"Agile project management tools, competency assessment tools","People":"Resource managers, project teams","Owner":"Resource management team"},{"Description":"Inability to transform organizational assets to sustain flexibility and growth","Impact":"Loss of flexibility and inability to adapt to future changes","Mitigation":"Invest in continuous organizational development and transformation, focus on building adaptable and scalable technologies","Technologies":"Digital transformation tools, scalable infrastructure solutions","People":"Technology leaders, innovation teams","Owner":"Technology and innovation departments"}]}
